sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个形容词均有"困难"之意。
means: difficult比hard较为正式，侧重需要特别的能力、智力、判断力、技巧或勇气才能克服障碍。也可指深奥或抽象的难题。
hard ： 含义广，通俗用词，与easy相对，泛指任何难理解，不好处理或不易做的事。

sentence.Network_en: He had a reputation for being bloody-minded and difficult.
sentence.Network_cn: 他为人刻薄、难相处是出了名的。

sentence.Network_en: I have a fair idea of how difficult things can be.
sentence.Network_cn: 我大致了解情况会有多困难。

sentence.Network_en: It would be difficult to find two men who were more dissimilar.
sentence.Network_cn: 很难找到彼此间差异更大的人了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 人教版七年级上册英语单词表 ... fun adj. 令人愉快的 difficult adj. 困难的 relaxing adj. 轻松的.
我自信一致难以(Difficult)保障贞节。而捷克、瑞士的前卫想要(Want to)攻破土耳其的防地，再烦，也别忘微笑；再急，也要注意语气…
Thomas等人提出了著名的气质九维度理论，并且认为“困难”(difficult)气质的儿童主要表现为经常出现消极情感，经常哭闹，生理活动没有规律，易怒，难以适应新环境。有研究考察了.
字典中艰字的解释 ... (2) 同本义[ hard] (3) 艰难;困难[ difficult;hard] (5) 险恶,危难[ dangerous].

list.abs: 三、教学难点（Difficult points）： 本课的三个句子以及拓展运用。 四、教具(Teaching Aids)：电脑课件（或录音机磁带）、手偶、教 …
difficult用法_百度知道 ... difficult 词组短语 Difficult Points 教学难点;学习难点 Difficult Kids 优的良曲;南搞小孩.
difficult part 困难部分difficult problem 难题difficult process 过程艰难
文本内容替换-猪八戒网 ... difficulty a. 困难 very difficult 非常困难 east n. 东.
初中新目标英语短语大全_小园香径_天涯博客 ... in Australia 在澳大利亚 too difficult 太难 enjoy doing sth . 喜爱做某事.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: back-formation from difficulty

entry.def: Something that is difficult is not easy to do, understand, or deal with.

example.ex: Hobart found it difficult to get her first book published...
example.tran: 霍巴特发现要出版自己的第一本书很不容易。

example.ex: The lack of childcare provisions made it difficult for single mothers to get jobs...
example.tran: 由于缺乏保育服务，单身母亲很难找到工作。

entry.tran: 难相处的;难取悦的;不随和的
entry.def: Someone who is difficult behaves in an unreasonable and unhelpful way.

example.ex: I had a feeling you were going to be difficult about this.
example.tran: 我有种感觉：你会在这件事上找别扭。

means.word_mean: 1. not easy; requiring great physical or mental effort to accomplish or comprehend or endure;

sentences.sentence: "nesting places on the cliffs are difficult of access"
"why is it so hard for you to keep a secret?"
"the mountain climb was long, steep, and difficult"

auth_sentence.content: You have to be calm in some difficult moments.
auth_sentence.res_content: You have to be calm in some difficult moments.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You have to be calm in some difficult moments.

auth_sentence.content: With Holland versus Belgium it's a difficult one.
auth_sentence.res_content: With Holland versus Belgium it's a difficult one.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: With Holland versus Belgium it's a difficult one.

auth_sentence.content: She's equally impressive on the more difficult stuff.
auth_sentence.res_content: She's equally impressive on the more difficult stuff.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She's equally impressive on the more difficult stuff.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 和辅音重复表示"不,否定,分开"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dif不,否定,分开+fic做+ult→不好做→困难的
dif不,否定,分开+fid相信+ent……的→不相信[自己]→自卑的
dif不,否定,分开+form形状→形状不同
dif不,否定,分开+fuse流→分开流→散布的
dif不,否定,分开+flu流+ence表名词→分开流
dif不,否定,分开+fer带来→带来不同→不同

Sentence.sentence: It is something difficult to get used to.
Large companies have a difficult time switching into new markets because there is a temptation to put existing assets into the new businesses.
When asked which activity would be the most difficult to give up for a week, 48% said listening to music.
That makes finding a solution all the more difficult.
The man is capable of dealing with difficult people.
The internet makes information billionaires out of all of us, and the architects of our online experiences are catching on to the need to make things creatively difficult

means.word_mean: 困难的, 难懂的，费力的；难做的；难解的

sentences.en: It is difficult for me to teach.
sentences.cn: 教书对于我是件不容易的事。

means.word_mean: 不易相处的, 难满足的，难以讨好的；难以取悦的；不愿帮助的

sentences.en: She was the most difficult customer the salesman had to deal with that day.
sentences.cn: 她是这个售货员那天所遇到的最难应付的一位顾客。

jushi.english: She's a difficult woman to get on with.
jushi.chinese: 她是个不易相处的妇女。

jushi.english: He bore himself with dignity under such difficult circumstances.
jushi.chinese: 他在如此艰难的环境中仍然保持了自己的尊严。

jushi.english: If you think that the repair is going to be a difficult job, we'll just have to call in a builder.
jushi.chinese: 如果你认为这项修理工作很困难的话,我们就得去请个建筑工人来了。
